remarks: The predicate "is a lattice translation".  Similar to definition of translation in [Crawley] p. 111.  (Contributed by NM, 11-May-2012.)
statement:
ltrnset.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
ltrnset.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
ltrnset.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
ltrnset.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
ltrnset.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
ltrnset.d $e |- D = ( ( LDil ` K ) ` W ) $.
ltrnset.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
isltrn $p |- ( ( K e. B /\ W e. H ) -> ( F e. T <-> ( F e. D /\ A. p e. A A. q e. A ( ( -. p .<_ W /\ -. q .<_ W ) -> ( ( p .\/ ( F ` p ) ) ./\ W ) = ( ( q .\/ ( F ` q ) ) ./\ W ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d A p q $.
$d F p q $.
$d K p q $.
$d W p q $.
